entry.title: Motion to Activate BIP 3
entry.summary: The communication emphasizes the importance of maintaining high-quality submissions within the context of the Bitcoin Development Mailing List. It warns that failing to adhere to this standard can lead to one's contributions being overlooked or ignored entirely, as recipients are not obliged to engage with every submission they receive. This cautionary note is framed within a broader concern about the potential influx of low-quality, AI-powered submissions, suggesting a trend that the community is beginning to observe. The message serves as a reminder of the value placed on meaningful participation and the consequences of not meeting the communityâ€™s expectations for quality content.
